author: Oren Etzioni, Nicole DeCario
title: AI Can Help Find Scientists Find a Covid-19 Vaccine
description: Artificial intelligence has already played a vital role in the outbreak since day 1—a reminder for the first time in a while that it can be a tool for good.
content: AI has gotten something of a bad rap in recent years, but the Covid-19 pandemic illustrates how AI can do a world of good in the race to find a vaccine. AI is playing two important supporting roles in this quest: suggesting components of a vaccine by understa… [+6420 chars]
